description: This file defines a React context for managing the state of a case management feature within a funeral service planning application. It includes type definitions for the case data structures, a reducer function for state updates, and context provider hooks.

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Handles state updates based on dispatched actions within the case context.

methods.name: CaseProvider
methods.description: React component that provides the case state and dispatch function via context to its children.

methods.name: useCase
methods.description: Custom hook to access the case context, providing state and dispatch functions.
